synopsis.text: Two married couples, who have been friends since their student days, embark on a weekend getaway to a hot spring inn. Seeking to reconnect and add excitement to their relationships, they decide to swap partners for one night. However, as passions ignite and intimacy deepens, they find themselves questioning what they truly want. Will this fleeting encounter strengthen their existing bonds or reveal secret yearnings better left unexplored? Their time at the inn becomes a journey of temptation, self-discovery and the true meaning of love and commitment.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
